name: Squid Simulator
description:
Bash boats to save your babies! Get combos to score big. Normal squid stuff.

(Squid Simulator requires XNA 4.0 and an Xbox 360 controller!)
If you don't have XNA, install these two files:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.a...
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.a...

CODE: Ian Campbell (@BootdiskRev)

ART: Justin Chan (@justinchans)

AUDIO: Joonas Turner (@KissaKolme)

Made at TOJAM13 in 30 hours over 3 days! Please enjoy! :)
